author: gawor
msg: split plugin portlet into 3 sub portlets and other minor layout improvements (GERONIMO-3868)

author: mcconne
msg: GERONIMODEVTOOLS-391 Allow support for message destination(s) editing in the various GEP deployment plan editors -- Thanks BJ Reed for the patch!!

author: tdonovan
msg: After r649840, mod_proxy_http will no longer append a query string from r->args if "no-canon".
Moved the NOESCAPE test down after PATH_INFO, and preserve the query string in r->filename if
Previously this was only done for CONNECT requests, where (r->uri == r->unparsed_uri)
